00019 CHM_SP as_cholmod_sparse(CHM_SP ans, SEXP x)
00020 {
00021     char *valid[] = {"dgCMatrix", "dsCMatrix", "dtCMatrix",
00022                      "lgCMatrix", "lsCMatrix", "ltCMatrix",
00023                      "ngCMatrix", "nsCMatrix", "ntCMatrix",
00024                      "zgCMatrix", "zsCMatrix", "ztCMatrix",
00025                      ""};
00026     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00027         ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00028     SEXP islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00029 
00030     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_sparse");
00031     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_sparse)); /* zero the struct */
00032 
00033     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00034     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00035     ans->packed = TRUE;
00036     ans->sorted = TRUE;
00037     ans->x = ans->z = ans->nz = (void *) NULL;
00038                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00039     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00040     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00041 
00042     ans->nzmax = LENGTH(islot);
00043                                 /* slots always present */
00044     ans->i = (void *) INTEGER(islot);
00045     ans->p = (void *) INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00046 
00047 #define AS_CHM_FINISH                                                           \
00048                                 /* set the xtype and any elements */            \
00049     switch(ctype / 3) {                                                         \
00050     case 0: /* "d" */                                                           \
00051         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;                                              \
00052         ans->x = (void *) REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));                       \
00053         break;                                                                  \
00054     case 1: /* "l" */                                                           \
00055         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;                                              \
00056         ans->x = (void *) REAL(coerceVector(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym), REALSXP)); \
00057         break;                                                                  \
00058     case 2: /* "n" */                                                           \
00059         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_PATTERN;                                           \
00060         break;                                                                  \
00061     case 3: /* "z" */                                                           \
00062         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;                                           \
00063         ans->x = (void *) COMPLEX(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));                    \
00064         break;                                                                  \
00065     }                                                                           \
00066                                 /* set the stype */                             \
00067     switch(ctype % 3) {                                                         \
00068     case 0: /* g(eneral) */                                                     \
00069         ans->stype = 0; break;                                                  \
00070     case 1: /* s(ymmetric) */                                                   \
00071         ans->stype =                                                            \
00072             (!strcmp(CHAR(asChar(getAttrib(x, Matrix_uploSym))), "U")) ?        \
00073             1 : -1;                                                             \
00074         break;                                                                  \
00075     case 2: /* t(riangular) */                                                  \
00076         ans->stype = 0; break; /* Note that triangularity property is lost */   \
00077 /*      error("triangular matrices not yet mapped to CHOLMOD"); */              \
00078     }                                                                           \
00079     return ans
00080 
00081     AS_CHM_FINISH;
00082 }
00083 
00099 SEXP chm_sparse_to_SEXP(CHM_SP a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00100                         const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00101 {
00102     SEXP ans;
00103     char *cl = "";              /* -Wall */
00104     int *dims, nnz;
00105 
00106     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00107                                 /* ensure a is sorted and packed */
00108     if (!a->sorted || !a->packed) cholmod_sort(a, &c);
00109     nnz = cholmod_nnz(a, &c);
00110                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00111     switch(a->xtype){
00112     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00113         cl = uploT ? "ntCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "nsCMatrix" : "ngCMatrix");
00114         break;
00115     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00116         switch(Rkind) {
00117         case 0:
00118             cl = uploT ? "dtCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "dsCMatrix" : "dgCMatrix");
00119             break;
00120         case 1:
00121             cl = uploT ? "ltCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "lsCMatrix" : "lgCMatrix");
00122             break;
00123         }
00124         break;
00125     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00126         cl = uploT ? "ztCMatrix": ((a->stype) ? "zsCMatrix" : "zgCMatrix");
00127         break;
00128     default: error("unknown xtype in cholmod_sparse object");
00129     }
00130     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00131                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00132     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00133     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00134     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, a->ncol + 1)),
00135            (int *) a->p, a->ncol + 1);
00136     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, nnz)),
00137            (int *) a->i, nnz);
00138                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00139     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00140         int i, *m_x;
00141         switch(Rkind) {
00142         case 0:
00143             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nnz)),
00144                    (double *) a->x, nnz);
00145             break;
00146         case 1:
00147             m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, nnz));
00148             for (i=0; i < nnz; i++)
00149                 m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00150             break;
00151         }
00152     }
00153     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00154         error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00155 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, nnz)), */
00156 /*             (complex *) a->x, nnz); */
00157     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00158         if (a->stype) error("Symmetric and triangular both set");
00159         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00160         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00161     }
00162     if (a->stype)               /* slot for symmetricMatrix */
00163         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00164                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00165     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_sparse(&a, &c);
00166     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00167     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00168         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00169 
00170     UNPROTECT(2);
00171     return ans;
00172 }

00187 CHM_TR as_cholmod_triplet(CHM_TR ans, SEXP x)
00188 {
00189     char *valid[] = {"dgTMatrix", "dsTMatrix", "dtTMatrix",
00190                      "lgTMatrix", "lsTMatrix", "ltTMatrix",
00191                      "ngTMatrix", "nsTMatrix", "ntTMatrix",
00192                      "zgTMatrix", "zsTMatrix", "ztTMatrix",
00193                      ""};
00194     int *dims, ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00195     SEXP islot;
00196 
00197     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_triplet");
00198     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_triplet)); /* zero the struct */
00199 
00200     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00201     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00202     ans->x = ans->z = (void *) NULL;
00203                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */
00204     dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00205     ans->nrow = dims[0];
00206     ans->ncol = dims[1];
00207     islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);
00208     ans->nnz = ans->nzmax = LENGTH(islot);
00209                                 /* slots always present */
00210     ans->i = (void *) INTEGER(islot);
00211     ans->j = (void *) INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym));
00212 
00213     AS_CHM_FINISH;
00214 }

00231 SEXP chm_triplet_to_SEXP(CHM_TR a, int dofree, int uploT, int Rkind,
00232                          const char* diag, SEXP dn)
00233 {
00234     SEXP ans;
00235     char *cl = "";              /* -Wall */
00236     int *dims;
00237 
00238     PROTECT(dn);  /* dn is usually UNPROTECTed before the call */
00239                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00240     switch(a->xtype) {
00241     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00242         cl = uploT ? "ntTMatrix" :
00243             ((a->stype) ? "nsTMatrix" : "ngTMatrix");
00244         break;
00245     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00246         switch(Rkind) {
00247         case 0:
00248             cl = uploT ? "dtTMatrix" :
00249                 ((a->stype) ? "dsTMatrix" : "dgTMatrix");
00250             break;
00251         case 1:
00252             cl = uploT ? "ltTMatrix" :
00253                 ((a->stype) ? "lsTMatrix" : "lgTMatrix");
00254             break;
00255         }
00256         break;
00257     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00258         cl = uploT ? "ztTMatrix" :
00259             ((a->stype) ? "zsTMatrix" : "zgTMatrix");
00260         break;
00261     default: error("unknown xtype in cholmod_triplet object");
00262     }
00263     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00264                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00265     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00266     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00267     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00268            (int *) a->i, a->nnz);
00269     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_jSym, INTSXP, a->nnz)),
00270            (int *) a->j, a->nnz);
00271                                 /* copy data slot if present */
00272     if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00273         int i, *m_x;
00274         switch(Rkind) {
00275         case 0:
00276             Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, a->nnz)),
00277                    (double *) a->x, a->nnz);
00278             break;
00279         case 1:
00280             m_x= LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, a->nnz));
00281             for (i=0; i < a->nnz; i++)
00282                 m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00283 /*          Memcpy(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, a->nnz)), */
00284 /*                 (int *) a->x, a->nnz); */
00285             break;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00289         error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00290 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00291 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00292     if (uploT) {                /* slots for triangularMatrix */
00293         if (a->stype) error("Symmetric and triangular both set");
00294         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym, mkString((uploT > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00295         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_diagSym, mkString(diag));
00296     }
00297                                 /* set symmetry attributes */
00298     if (a->stype)
00299         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00300                  mkString((a->stype > 0) ? "U" : "L"));
00301     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_triplet(&a, &c);
00302     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00303     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00304         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00305     UNPROTECT(2);
00306     return ans;
00307 }
00308 
00322 CHM_DN as_cholmod_dense(CHM_DN ans, SEXP x)
00323 {
00324 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_1                                             \
00325     char *valid[] = {"dmatrix", "dgeMatrix",                            \
00326                      "lmatrix", "lgeMatrix",                            \
00327                      "nmatrix", "ngeMatrix",                            \
00328                      "zmatrix", "zgeMatrix", ""};                       \
00329     int dims[2], ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid), nprot = 0; \
00330                                                                         \
00331     if (ctype < 0) {            /* not a classed matrix */              \
00332         if (isMatrix(x)) Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(getAttrib(x, R_DimSymbol)), 2); \
00333         else {dims[0] = LENGTH(x); dims[1] = 1;}                        \
00334         if (isInteger(x)) {                                             \
00335             x = PROTECT(coerceVector(x, REALSXP));                      \
00336             nprot++;                                                    \
00337         }                                                               \
00338         ctype = (isReal(x) ? 0 :                                        \
00339                  (isLogical(x) ? 2 : /* logical -> default to "l", not "n" */ \
00340                   (isComplex(x) ? 6 : -1)));                            \
00341     } else Memcpy(dims, INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)), 2);        \
00342     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_dense");\
00343     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_dense)); /* zero the struct */        \
00344                                                                         \
00345     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE; /* characteristics of the system */    \
00346     ans->x = ans->z = (void *) NULL;                                    \
00347                                 /* dimensions and nzmax */              \
00348     ans->d = ans->nrow = dims[0];                                       \
00349     ans->ncol = dims[1];                                                \
00350     ans->nzmax = dims[0] * dims[1];                                     \
00351                                 /* set the xtype and any elements */    \
00352     switch(ctype / 2) {                                                 \
00353     case 0: /* "d" */                                                   \
00354         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;                                      \
00355         ans->x = (void *) REAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00356         break
00357 
00358     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00359 
00360     case 1: /* "l" */
00361         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00362         ans->x =
00363             (void *) REAL(coerceVector((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x,
00364                                        REALSXP));
00365         break;
00366     case 2: /* "n" */
00367         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00368         ans->x = (void *) LOGICAL((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x);
00369         break;
00370 
00371 #define _AS_cholmod_dense_2                                             \
00372     case 3: /* "z" */                                                   \
00373         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_COMPLEX;                                   \
00374         ans->x = (void *) COMPLEX((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x); \
00375         break;                                                          \
00376     }                                                                   \
00377     UNPROTECT(nprot);                                                   \
00378     return ans
00379 
00380     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00381 }
00382 
00383 /* version of as_cholmod_dense() that produces a cholmod_dense matrix
00384  * with REAL 'x' slot -- i.e. treats "nMatrix" as "lMatrix" -- as only difference;
00385  * Not just via a flag in as_cholmod_dense() since that has fixed API */
00386 CHM_DN as_cholmod_x_dense(cholmod_dense *ans, SEXP x)
00387 {
00388     _AS_cholmod_dense_1;
00389 
00390     case 1: /* "l" */
00391     case 2: /* "n" (no NA in 'x', but *has* 'x' slot => treat as "l" */
00392         ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00393         ans->x =
00394             (void *) REAL(coerceVector((ctype % 2) ? GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym) : x,
00395                                        REALSXP));
00396         break;
00397 
00398     _AS_cholmod_dense_2;
00399 }
00400 
00401 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_1
00402 #undef _AS_cholmod_dense_2
00403 
00404 void R_cholmod_error(int status, char *file, int line, char *message)
00405 {
00406     error(_("Cholmod error '%s' at file:%s, line %d"), message, file, line);
00407 }
00408 
00409 /* just to get 'int' instead of 'void' as required by CHOLMOD's print_function */
00410 static
00411 int R_cholmod_printf(const char* fmt, ...)
00412 {
00413     va_list(ap);
00414 
00415     va_start(ap, fmt);
00416     Rprintf((char *)fmt, ap);
00417     va_end(ap);
00418     return 0;
00419 }
00420 
00429 int R_cholmod_start(CHM_CM c)
00430 {
00431     int res;
00432     if (!(res = cholmod_start(c)))
00433         error(_("Unable to initialize cholmod: error code %d"), res);
00434     c->print_function = R_cholmod_printf; /* Rprintf gives warning */
00435     c->error_handler = R_cholmod_error;
00436     return TRUE;
00437 }

00451 /* FIXME: should also have args  (int uploST, char *diag) */
00452 
00453 SEXP chm_dense_to_SEXP(CHM_DN a, int dofree, int Rkind, SEXP dn)
00454 {
00455     SEXP ans;
00456     char *cl = ""; /* -Wall */
00457     int *dims, ntot;
00458 
00459     PROTECT(dn); /* << (why? -- just cut&paste from chm_dense_to_mat.. below*/
00460 
00461     switch(a->xtype) {          /* determine the class of the result */
00462 /* CHOLMOD_PATTERN never happens because cholmod_dense can't :
00463  *     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00464  *      cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00465  */
00466     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00467         switch(Rkind) { /* -1: special for this function! */
00468         case -1: cl = "ngeMatrix"; break;
00469         case 0:  cl = "dgeMatrix"; break;
00470         case 1:  cl = "lgeMatrix"; break;
00471         default: error("unknown 'Rkind'");
00472         }
00473         break;
00474     case CHOLMOD_COMPLEX:
00475         cl = "zgeMatrix"; break;
00476     default:
00477         error("unknown xtype");
00478     }
00479 
00480     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(cl)));
00481                                 /* allocate and copy common slots */
00482     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00483     dims[0] = a->nrow; dims[1] = a->ncol;
00484     ntot = dims[0] * dims[1];
00485     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot -- always present in dense(!) */
00486         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) {
00487             int i, *m_x;
00488             switch(Rkind) {
00489             case 0:
00490                 Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, ntot)),
00491                        (double *) a->x, ntot);
00492                 break;
00493             case -1: /* nge*/
00494             case 1:  /* lge*/
00495                 m_x = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot));
00496                 for (i=0; i < ntot; i++)
00497                     m_x[i] = (int) ((double *) a->x)[i];
00498 /*              Memcpy(LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, ntot)), */
00499 /*                     (int *) a->x, ntot); */
00500                 break;
00501             }
00502         }
00503         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00504             error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00505 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, ntot)), */
00506 /*             (complex *) a->x, ntot); */
00507     } else error("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written");
00508 
00509     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_dense(&a, &c);
00510     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00511     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00512         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, duplicate(dn));
00513     UNPROTECT(2);
00514     return ans;
00515 }
00516 
00527 SEXP chm_dense_to_matrix(CHM_DN a, int dofree, SEXP dn)
00528 {
00529     SEXP ans;
00530     SEXPTYPE typ;
00531 
00532     PROTECT(dn);
00533                                 /* determine the class of the result */
00534     typ = (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN) ? LGLSXP :
00535         ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? REALSXP :
00536          ((a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX) ? CPLXSXP : NILSXP));
00537     if (typ == NILSXP) error("unknown xtype");
00538 
00539     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(typ, a->nrow, a->ncol));
00540     if (a->d == a->nrow) {      /* copy data slot if present */
00541         if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL)
00542             Memcpy(REAL(ans), (double *) a->x, a->nrow * a->ncol);
00543         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_COMPLEX)
00544             error("complex sparse matrix code not yet written");
00545         else if (a->xtype == CHOLMOD_PATTERN)
00546             error("don't know if a dense pattern matrix makes sense");
00547 /*      Memcpy(COMPLEX(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, CPLXSXP, a->nnz)), */
00548 /*             (complex *) a->x, a->nz); */
00549     } else error("code for cholmod_dense with holes not yet written");
00550 
00551     if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_dense(&a, &c);
00552     if (dofree < 0) Free(a);
00553     if (dn != R_NilValue)
00554         setAttrib(ans, R_DimNamesSymbol, duplicate(dn));
00555     UNPROTECT(2);
00556     return ans;
00557 }
00558 
00559 CHM_DN numeric_as_chm_dense(CHM_DN ans, double *v, int nr, int nc)
00560 {
00561     ans->d = ans->nrow = nr;
00562     ans->ncol = nc;
00563     ans->nzmax = nr * nc;
00564     ans->x = (void *) v;
00565     ans->xtype = CHOLMOD_REAL;
00566     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00567     return ans;
00568 }
00569 
00583 CHM_FR as_cholmod_factor(CHM_FR ans, SEXP x)
00584 {
00585     char *valid[] = {"dCHMsuper", "dCHMsimpl", "nCHMsuper", "nCHMsimpl", ""};
00586     int *type = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("type"))),
00587         ctype = Matrix_check_class(class_P(x), valid);
00588     SEXP tmp;
00589 
00590     if (ctype < 0) error("invalid class of object to as_cholmod_factor");
00591     memset(ans, 0, sizeof(cholmod_factor)); /* zero the struct */
00592 
00593     ans->itype = CHOLMOD_INT;   /* characteristics of the system */
00594     ans->dtype = CHOLMOD_DOUBLE;
00595     ans->z = (void *) NULL;
00596     ans->xtype = (ctype < 2) ? CHOLMOD_REAL : CHOLMOD_PATTERN;
00597 
00598     ans->ordering = type[0];    /* unravel the type */
00599     ans->is_ll = (type[1] ? 1 : 0);
00600     ans->is_super = (type[2] ? 1 : 0);
00601     ans->is_monotonic = (type[3] ? 1 : 0);
00602                                 /* check for consistency */
00603     if ((!(ans->is_ll)) && ans->is_super)
00604         error(_("Supernodal LDL' decomposition not available"));
00605     if ((!type[2]) ^ (ctype % 2))
00606         error(_("Supernodal/simplicial class inconsistent with type flags"));
00607                                 /* slots always present */
00608     tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_permSym);
00609     ans->minor = ans->n = LENGTH(tmp); ans->Perm = INTEGER(tmp);
00610     ans->ColCount = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("colcount")));
00611     ans->z = ans->x = (void *) NULL;
00612     if (ctype < 2) {
00613         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym);
00614         ans->x = REAL(tmp);
00615     }
00616     if (ans->is_super) {        /* supernodal factorization */
00617         ans->xsize = LENGTH(tmp);
00618         ans->maxcsize = type[4]; ans->maxesize = type[5];
00619         ans->i = (int*)NULL;
00620         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("super"));
00621         ans->nsuper = LENGTH(tmp) - 1; ans->super = INTEGER(tmp);
00622         /* Move these checks to the CHMfactor_validate function */
00623         if (ans->nsuper < 1)
00624             error(_("Number of supernodes must be positive when is_super is TRUE"));
00625         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("pi"));
00626         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00627             error(_("Lengths of super and pi must be equal"));
00628         ans->pi = INTEGER(tmp);
00629         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("px"));
00630         if (LENGTH(tmp) != ans->nsuper + 1)
00631             error(_("Lengths of super and px must be equal"));
00632         ans->px = INTEGER(tmp);
00633         tmp = GET_SLOT(x, install("s"));
00634         ans->ssize = LENGTH(tmp); ans->s = INTEGER(tmp);
00635     } else {
00636         ans->nzmax = LENGTH(tmp);
00637         ans->p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym));
00638         ans->i = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym));
00639         ans->nz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nz")));
00640         ans->next = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("nxt")));
00641         ans->prev = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("prv")));
00642     }
00643     if (!cholmod_check_factor(ans, &c))
00644         error(_("failure in as_cholmod_factor"));
00645     return ans;
00646 }
00647 
00657 SEXP chm_factor_to_SEXP(CHM_FR f, int dofree)
00658 {
00659     SEXP ans;
00660     int *dims, *type;
00661     char *class = (char*) NULL; /* -Wall */
00662 
00663     switch(f->xtype) {
00664     case CHOLMOD_REAL:
00665         class = f->is_super ? "dCHMsuper" : "dCHMsimpl";
00666         break;
00667     case CHOLMOD_PATTERN:
00668         class = f->is_super ? "nCHMsuper" : "nCHMsimpl";
00669         break;
00670     default:
00671         error(_("f->xtype of %d not recognized"), f->xtype);
00672     }
00673     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(class)));
00674     if (f->minor < f->n)
00675         error(_("CHOLMOD factorization was unsuccessful"));
00676     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00677     dims[0] = dims[1] = f->n;
00678                                 /* copy component of known length */
00679     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, f->n)),
00680            (int*)f->Perm, f->n);
00681     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("colcount"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00682            (int*)f->ColCount, f->n);
00683     type = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("type"), INTSXP, f->is_super ? 6 : 4));
00684     type[0] = f->ordering; type[1] = f->is_ll;
00685     type[2] = f->is_super; type[3] = f->is_monotonic;
00686     if (f->is_super) {
00687         type[4] = f->maxcsize; type[5] = f->maxesize;
00688         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("super"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00689                (int*)f->super, f->nsuper+1);
00690         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("pi"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00691                (int*)f->pi, f->nsuper + 1);
00692         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("px"), INTSXP, f->nsuper + 1)),
00693                (int*)f->px, f->nsuper + 1);
00694         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("s"), INTSXP, f->ssize)),
00695                (int*)f->s, f->ssize);
00696         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->xsize)),
00697                (double*)f->x, f->xsize);
00698     } else {
00699         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, f->nzmax)),
00700            (int*)f->i, f->nzmax);
00701         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym, INTSXP, f->n + 1)),
00702            (int*)f->p, f->n + 1);
00703         Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, f->nzmax)),
00704                (double*)f->x, f->nzmax);
00705         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nz"), INTSXP, f->n)),
00706                (int*)f->nz, f->n);
00707         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("nxt"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00708                (int*)f->next, f->n + 2);
00709         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("prv"), INTSXP, f->n + 2)),
00710                (int*)f->prev, f->n + 2);
00711 
00712     }
00713     if(dofree) {
00714         if (dofree > 0) cholmod_free_factor(&f, &c);
00715         else /* dofree < 0 */ Free(f);
00716     }
00717     UNPROTECT(1);
00718     return ans;
00719 }

00726 }
